title: Okay so I get that marksmen aren't mandatory in the botlane
body:
but I don't know how the meta shifts for supports...can I still play all of them or did they kinda get rooted out too? Im so confused!
Can someone explain the impact that these changes have so I can plan accordingly for my normal and ranked games? Pretty please!{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

replies.body: Seems more damage oriented supports work best, Bot is just a kill lane now, the game itself is just a kill orgy atm.

> [{quoted}](name=MrHaZeYo,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6HXEsjvM,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-06-14T00:44:07.644+0000)
>
> Seems more damage oriented supports work best, Bot is just a kill lane now, the game itself is just a kill orgy atm.

Rip enchanters...*sigh* well hopefully riot will bring damage down a lot more. Like I love killing but not to where its two abilities and poof. That's not fun. For either side...
